## Correlation Matrix of different pollutant

```{r}
# read data
pollution_month <- read.csv("Pollution.csv")
head(pollution_month)
```



```{r fig.width=10, fig.height=10,message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# draw the correlation matrix between each variables
library(extracat)
library(GGally)
library(dplyr)
ggpairs(pollution_month,
        column = c(4:16),
        title = "Correlation Matrix of Different Pollutant") + 
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 16, face = "bold"))

```
